articles.title: Crypto Firm BitGo Targets Nearly $2 Billion Valuation in US IPO Filing
articles.description: Private crypto wallet and custody firm BitGo filed for an initial public offering in the U.S. with aims to raise as much as $200 million.

articles.title: CFTC to tap Tyler Winklevoss, other crypto CEOs as first members of innovation panel
articles.description: Mike Selig, chairman of the Commodity Futures Trading Commission, is settling in with the revamping of a new innovation panel with many crypto names.

articles.title: Apple Taps Google's Gemini to Power AI Models After 'Apple Intelligence' Stumbles
articles.description: Apple says its next generation of AI models will be based on Google’s Gemini, marking a reset after its in-house effort failed to compete.

articles.title: Stablecoin platform VelaFi secures $20M to scale cross-border settlement rails
articles.description: The funding will support expansion of enterprise payment and settlement services across Latin America, the United States and Asia.

articles.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum ETFs Shed Nearly All 2026 Gains as Rate Cut Hopes Fade
articles.description: Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs are surrendering nearly all 2026 gains as fading Fed rate cut hopes drive sizable crypto fund outflows.

articles.title: Crypto infrastructure firm Bakkt jumps 17% on deeper stablecoin payments push with new deal
articles.description: The firm said it has agreed to acquire Distributed Technologies Research, a blockchain-based payment infrastructure provider.

articles.title: Price predictions 1/12: SPX, DXY, BTC, ETH, XRP, BNB, SOL, DOGE, ADA, BCH
articles.description: Bitcoin and several major altcoins bounced off their strong support levels, but charts and trading volume suggest bears will continue to sell at the range highs.

articles.title: Crypto Markets Stagnate as Gold and Silver Rally to New Highs
Two UK-Registered Companies Moved $1B in Stablecoins for Iran: Report
articles.description: The two companies transferred a total of $619.1 million in funds to wallets linked to Iran’s Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps in 2024.

articles.title: Crypto enters round 2 of institutional adoption led by Morgan Stanley: Binance
articles.description: Binance Research said crypto markets are entering a new phase, as institutional allocation and strategic positioning begin to outweigh retail-driven momentum.

articles.title: NEAR rises 5.7% to $1.73 before giving back gains
articles.description: The layer 1 blockchain token advanced on moderately elevated volume but underperformed key benchmarks, raising sustainability questions.

articles.description:

articles.title: Tennessee Demands Polymarket, Kalshi and Crypto.com End Sports Prediction Markets
articles.description: Polymarket and other leading prediction market platforms were ordered to immediately close all sports-related markets in the state and refund pending wagers.

articles.title: Polygon Foundation CEO Touts 'Benefits' of Holding POL as Active Addresses Slide
articles.description: Polygon’s daily revenue has jumped to levels around $200,000, while its active address count has slipped since December.
